generated_body: In the article titled "How to Cure Jet Lag, According to an Airline CEO," the user is likely to find practical advice and strategies for mitigating jet lag, drawing on insights from an authority in the airline industry. The piece may explore various methods to adjust sleep patterns before and after travel, as well as tips on hydration and in-flight routines that can enhance comfort.
